segments.text: Hi there, it's great to meet you. How is your day going so far? I'm Kulu and I'm here to help you get everything set up today.
By the end of our call, you'll have your very own AI meeting link, just like the one we're using right now, ready to share with your users to help them onboard onto your product.
Do you have the Kulu portal open already? If not, no worries. You can find the link in the email sent by Oscar or Ed.
Once you're there, just log in with your work, Google account, click Create Company, and give it a name. You can then choose to start trial to get everything moving.
Before we dive into the details, could you share your screen? That way I can see exactly what you're looking at and guide you much more effectively.

The best way to interpret the projected usage is to think of it as a weather forecast for your minutes.
It takes how much you've used so far in your current billing cycle and stretches that rate out to the end of the month.
If that projected number is getting close to your monthly limit, it's a good early signal that you might want to adjust your plan or keep an eye on how many meetings are being held.
